backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and marketplace listings with access control, CRUD operations, and multiple filtered listing queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to impacted files, components, and test references for the game project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and style configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable setup defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode overrides for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and renders global UI utilities like ProfileSetupDialog and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states, error recovery, and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that blocks unauthenticated users and shows a sign‑in required card with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL form fields.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file for a safe image component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with dynamic UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, login button, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a dialog for new users to enter their name and creates their profile via a mutation.
React hook that initializes a Web Audio oscillator and plays a looping chiptune melody when enabled.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines grid, speed, scoring, spawn intervals, and planetary effect constants for the game.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Manages game state, timing, rendering, and spawning logic for the main Snake-like game loop.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Provides canvas rendering helpers for UFOs, cows, and the penguin boss.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Implements an animated starfield background renderer with twinkling and drifting stars.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Exports a catalog of snake skins with IDs, names, descriptions, and color schemes.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for directions, game entities, obstacles, power-ups, bosses, and game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: Displays a small overlay showing keyboard, touch, and mouse control hints.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: Shows score, level, and planet/gravity status in a styled HUD card.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Combines identity and user profile query to expose current user state and authentication info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling AuthClient setup, login, logout, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and saving the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a cosmic color theme, fonts, and shared component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons for gameplay and leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a mock leaderboard with styled cards and placeholders for future user-linked scoring.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: UI for selecting local or multiplayer modes with placeholders for lobby creation and joining.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Runs the game loop with canvas rendering, HUD, audio controls, pause handling, and game over overlay.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Renders the skins selection UI with preview cards, showing owned and active skins; backend integration for ownership is pending.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including Spacecoco’s goals, architecture notes, features, and versioning metadata.
